subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Terrell Owens, Tony Romo and the Cowboys stamped their claim to N.F.C. supremacy after Green Bay lost Brett Favre, who injured his right arm in the second quarter.
snippet: Terrell Owens, Tony Romo and the Cowboys stamped their claim to N.F.C. supremacy after Green Bay lost Brett Favre, who injured his right arm in the second quarter.
